org.mokai.persist.jdbc
Interface MessageHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSmsHandler, ApplicationsSmsHandler, ConnectionsSmsHandler, OutboundInboundHandler
public interface MessageHandler

Abstracts the message operations from the JdbcMessageStore allowing users to customize them. Besides the normal operations to handle messages (insert, update, etc.), it exposes methods to tell the JdbcMessageStore that it supports or not a specific type of message.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Summary

Method Detail

supportsDirection

boolean supportsDirection(Message.Direction direction)
Tells whether this handler supports a specific direction of a Message or not.

Parameters:
direction - the direction to be tested.
Returns:
true if it supports the direction of the message, false otherwise.
See Also:
Message.Direction

insertMessage

                   Message message)
                   throws SQLException
Inserts a Message into the database.

Parameters:
conn - the Connection used to insert the message.
message - the message to be inserted.
Returns:
the generated id of the inserted message.
Throws:
SQLException - if something goes wrong.

updateMessage

                      Message message)
                      throws SQLException
Updates a Message record from the database.

Parameters:
conn - the Connection used to update the message.
message - the message to be updated.
Returns:
true if the message was found, false otherwise.
Throws:
SQLException - if something goes wrong.

updateMessagesStatus

void updateMessagesStatus(Connection conn,
                          MessageCriteria criteria,
                          byte newStatus)
                          throws SQLException
Updates the status of all the messages that matches the criteria.

Parameters:
conn - the Connection used to update the status of the messages.
criteria - the criteria used to select the messages that are going to be updated.
newStatus - the new status for the messages.
Throws:
SQLException - if something goes wrong.

listMessages

Collection<Message> listMessages(Connection conn,
                                 MessageCriteria criteria)
                                 throws SQLException
Retrieves the messages that matches the criteria.

Parameters:
conn - the Connection used to retrieve the messages.
criteria - the criteria used to select the messages that are going to be retrieved.
Returns:
a Collection of Message objects.
Throws:
SQLException - if something goes wrong.
